nodes.bodyText: Have you imported the ide-config to your IDE?

Ya!. I even 'mvn clean compile ...'  before committing so that auto-formatter formats the changes. But I don't think the formatter touches stuff as ordering imports. Something else is broken on my side.
Hmm... The Eclipse Formatter IntelliJ plugin was forcing Eclipse style imports ordering. I turned it off and it is better. Watch out if you are using it with 'optimize imports'.
